alert.note: Alert for Ferry; Okanogan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 18 at 2:54AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON PDT TODAY THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of North Central and Northeast Washington, including the following counties, in North Central Washington, Okanogan. In Northeast Washington, Ferry. * WHEN...From Noon PDT today through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff from slow moving showers and thunderstorms may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations including burn scars. Rock slides or mud slides will be possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
